These 23 members were selected from 35,678 applicants.
They are the official rivals of Nogizaka46!
We look forward to working with you all!
Now, for those of you with still cameras, please refrain from using flash photography from this point on.

Now then, I would like to move on to the announcement of the name of the group that you are all anxious about.
What is the name of the group?
Nogizaka46 Official Rivals Group name is here!
The name of the group is "Boku ga mitakatta aozora" ("The blue sky I wanted to see").
What do you think?
I don't know if it's contrary to my expectations or not.
But once again, the management staff has sent us their thoughts on the name of the group.
I will read it out.
Everyone has a dream that they had when they were little.
It is the wish we had for what we want to be when we grow up.

So far we have had our first training camp, our first music video shooting, and our first shooting for Sazuna, but we haven't seen the blue sky yet because of the continuous rain and unseasonal typhoons.
I hope that we will be able to see blue skies that live up to the name of this group, and grow as a group that lives up to its name.
I hope we can grow as a group that lives up to our name.
